 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנֹג‎</span>, [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 31</sup>] **verb** ==be soft, delicate, dainty== (Late Hebrew ***id.*** Pi\`el ***make soft, pliable, live*** or ***spend in enjoyment***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***use amorous behaviour, affect langour***); — 

**Pu\`al** ***Participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּעֻנָּגָה‎</span> [[Jer.6.2|Jer 6:2]] ***daintily bred***, figurative of Jerusalem. 

**Hithpa\`el 1.** ***be of dainty habit, Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְעַנֵּג‎</span> [[Deut.28.56|Deut 28:56]] (woman, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹךְ‎</span>). 

**2.** ***take exquisite delight***, ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִתְעַנְּגוּ‎</span> consecutive [[Ps.37.11|Ps 37:11]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of thing); 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִתְעַנַּגְתֶּם‎</span> consecutive [[Isa.66.11|Isa 66:11]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of thing); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְעַנָּ֑ג‎</span> [[Job.27.10|Job 27:10]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְעַנַּג‎</span> [[Isa.58.14|Isa 58:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְעַנָּ֑ג‎</span> [[Job.22.26|Job 22:26]] (all with [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁדַּי‎</span>] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַליֿ‎</span>); 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְעַנַּג‎</span> [[Isa.55.2|Isa 55:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of thing); ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְעַנַּג עַליֿ‎</span> [[Ps.37.4|Ps 37:4]]. 

**3.** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>, in bad sense, ***make merry over, make sport of, Imperfect*** 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלמִֿי תִּתְעַנָּ֑גוּ‎</span> [[Isa.57.4|Isa 57:4]].
